trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 속성이 지정된 형식에서 파생된 요소만 검색할 수 있도록 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: 용어의 의미 `browsable` 이 대 한 설명에서 사용 되는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 에 대 한 설명과 유사 <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, 하지만 연결된 된 속성에 대 한 검색 가능한 상태는 하는 방법에 대 한 속성정보[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]연결된 된 속성은 주로 때문에 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 개념입니다.

trans-unit.source: If more than one type is specified for a <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 둘 이상의 형식이 지정 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], 속성은 일치 하는 형식을 지정 하는 경우에 검색 가능한 (논리적 또는).

trans-unit.source: The type can also be an interface.
trans-unit.target: 형식을 인터페이스로 될 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 지정 <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
trans-unit.target: 이 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 연결 된 속성 정의의 get 접근자에만 적용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.
trans-unit.target: 이 적용 되지 않습니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] set 접근자에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
trans-unit.target: 탐색할 수 있도록 발송 되는 설정 작업은 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 관련 요소는 존재 여부와 true 동작을 제어 하는 요소를 정의 하는 속성에 get 접근자의 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 연결된 속성 선언에 대 한 일반적인 정보를 참조 하십시오. [연결 된 속성 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The intended type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: 이 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]이 적용되는 연결된 속성의 사용 범위를 지정하는 의도된 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> class, using the provided <paramref name="targetType" />.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 <paramref name="targetType" />을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />와 비교할 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]이 지정된 개체와 같은지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see langword="true" />가 현재<see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />와 같으면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> 이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서는이 노출 하는 설정 가능한 값 중 하나에 값이 같은지 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]의 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An unsigned 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: 부호 없는 32비트 정수 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서는 여러 가능한 해시 값이 노출 하는 설정 가능한 값 중 하나에 따라 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the base type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 속성의 사용 범위를 지정하는 기본 형식을 가져옵니다. 해당 사용 범위에 이 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]이 적용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The requested <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 요청된 <see cref="T:System.Type" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 통해서만 설정할 수는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 선언에서 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique type identifier for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]의 고유 형식 식별자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that is a unique identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />의 고유 식별자인 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 각각에 대해 고유한 값을 반환 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], 데 필요 하기 때문에이 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 여러 번 사용할 수 있습니다.
